name: Paracetamol tablet (acetaminophen tablet)
productDescription: Paracetamol tablet is a widely used oral solid dosage form containing paracetamol (acetaminophen) as the active pharmaceutical ingredient. It is primarily used for the relief of pain (analgesic) and reduction of fever

name: Amoxicillin tablet
productDescription: Amoxicillin tablet is a solid oral dosage form containing amoxicillin, a broad-spectrum β-lactam antibiotic belonging to the penicillin group. It is widely prescribed for the treatment of various bacterial infections.

name: Medroxyprogesterone Tablet
storage: Keep dry & cool place also Protect from light
productDescription: Medroxyprogesterone Tablet is an oral solid dosage form containing medroxyprogesterone acetate, a synthetic progesterone derivative (progestin). It is widely used in gynecological and hormonal disorders related to progesterone deficiency

name: Progesterone Tablet
productDescription: Progesterone Tablet is an oral solid dosage form containing progesterone, a natural female sex hormone (progestogen). It is used in the management of conditions associated with progesterone deficiency and for maintaining normal menstrual and reproductive functions.

name: Levonorgestrel Tablet
productDescription: Levonorgestrel Tablet is an oral solid dosage form containing levonorgestrel, a synthetic progestin (second-generation). It is mainly used for contraception, including emergency contraception, and for the management of certain gynecological disorders.

name: Levonorgestrel and ethinyl estradiol Tablet
productDescription: Levonorgestrel and ethinyl estradiol Tablet is a combined oral contraceptive (COC) tablet containing levonorgestrel (a synthetic progestin) and ethinyl estradiol (a synthetic estrogen). It is widely used for birth control and for the management of various menstrual and hormonal disorders.

name: Drospirenone and ethinyl estradiol Tablet
productDescription: Drospirenone and ethinyl estradiol is a combined oral contraceptive (COC) containing drospirenone (a synthetic progestin with antimineralocorticoid activity) and ethinyl estradiol (a synthetic estrogen). It is used for contraception and for managing certain hormonal and menstrual disorders.

name: Povidone iodine solution
storage: Keep dry & cool place, Protect from light, Keep container tightly closed
productDescription: Povidone iodine solution is a topical antiseptic solution containing povidone-iodine, a stable chemical complex of iodine with polyvinylpyrrolidone (PVP). It is widely used for skin disinfection, wound care, and pre-operative antisepsis due to its broad-spectrum antimicrobial activity.
